children.description: Content rendered inside DragDrop (React component or element)

className.description: Class to add to outer div

droppableId.description: Id to be passed back on drop events

hasNoWrapper.description: Don't wrap the component in a div. Requires passing a single child.

zone.description: Name of zone that items can be dragged between. Should specify if there is more than one Droppable on the page.
